## Form.reIndexFieldOrder() method

After changes to the HTML, reindexing is necessary

After changes to the HTML, reindexing is necessary. This method rehashes the field order after HTML changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
reIndexFieldOrder(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
